publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4174 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Commencement No. 2 and Consequential Provisions) (Scotland) Order 2006â€”That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Commencement No. 2 and Consequential Provisions) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved.
